scripts.installTarget: rm -rf ./node_modules && docker run -it -v $(pwd):/src node:8.10 /bin/sh -c 'cd src;npm i'
scripts.pushCode: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name CandyManStaging --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --profile hey
scripts.pushEnv: aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name CandyManStaging --profile hey --environment Variables="{`cat .env | xargs | sed 's/ /,/g'`}"
